name: Teldrassin
description:
Pitch

Teldrassin is a tiny open-world FPS game where you play as a human-plant mutant who goes on a quest to explore the abyss of a post-apocalyptic forest which holds the keys to a disapeared civilization.

Link to the Global Game Jam page

Contributors
  • Yann Roirand - Producer
  • François Hoffschir - Dev Unreal
  • Yann Kiener - Dev Unreal
  • Benjamin Robcis - Dev Unreal, Level Designer
  • Elwan Saillant - Game Designer, Level Designer
  • Léo Beauvais Gély - Game Designer
  • Benjamin Farigoul - 3D Graphist
  • Aurélien Montero - Sound Designer
